resources.string: Notification channel for the FirebasePigeon practice app
This app is a demo for Firebase Messaging Services (FMS). At the Google Firebase Console, I created the "FirebasePigeon" application. Then I enabled this app to receive *Cloud Messages* from it.

* Open the Firebase Console 
* Open the FirebasePigeon application 
* Click on Notifications 
* Create a new message. drop the advance options section and add Custom Data 
key="title" value="whatever" 
key="message" value="whatever" 
* send message
I am righ here, watching the wheels go round and round...
